title: Kill Bill
description: Kill Bill is Tarantino's debut novel, an extraordinary work of fiction that will speak powerfully to his many admirers. It's the story of The Bride, a world-class assassin and a retired member of the elite, all-female Deadly Viper Assassination Squad (DiVAS), who's ready to settle down to a quiet life of marriage and family.
author: Quentin Tarantino
